name: ASG (Another ShipShooter Game)
description:
[Project made for The Space Jam 2021]
Do you remember the old classics like Galaga and Galaxian? Those games that gave us fun in the 80s that entertained us every afternoon or evening with the family, well ... ASG (Another ShipShooter Game) brings those emotions back to the present times!
You are a spaceship pilot who travels through space, but ... there is a problem, your ship cannot stop due to a fault inside, so you will have to avoid colliding with meteorites at all costs, if you collide with them, you die! if you leave the screen you die! if you don't drive carefully .. YOU DIE!
Good luck!
[All sprites and sound effects are made for this game]
